genresAdvancedInfo.name: manipuri pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Manipuri pop is a popular music genre from the northeastern Indian state of Manipur. It blends traditional Manipuri folk music with contemporary pop and rock elements, creating a unique sound that is both modern and rooted in tradition. The genre has gained popularity in recent years, with many young Manipuri artists creating music that reflects the region's rich cultural heritage.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
